name: Light This Up
description:
PGF 2014 Awards for Best Educational Game and Most Innovative Game. Judges from Microsoft & Amazon.

Light This Up is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.

Draw wires and connect electrical components to light this bulb. Components should sum up to the right power for your bulb to light up.

Free to play through lots of levels.

Features
* Simple to learn, challenge to master
* Smooth draw line experience
* Over 200 fun levels
* Tons of fun with your friends
